Minor changes to LPPL

Oct 11, 2004

Minor changes to LPPL

The LaTeX project public license (LPPL), version 1.3a, has been released. It includes a correction in the warranty section (the phrase «unless required by applicable law» got lost at some point) and clarification on the difference between «maintained» and «author-maintained».

LaTeX Project
